item.description:

and i complited no errors and…WTF some have idea what the problem i have?.. :F THX

PS. added this to itemdef.java
case 13351: itemDef.name = "Dragon defender"; itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.modelID = 62368; itemDef.modelZoom = 592; itemDef.anInt165 = 62367; //male wield model itemDef.anInt200 = 62367; //femArmModel itemDef.modelRotationY = 323; itemDef.modelRotationX = 1845; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -16; itemDef.modelOffset2 = -3; itemDef.description = "A defensive weapon.".getBytes(); break;

yeah… some idea?
